radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the brain and cervical spine
radiographic_examinations.findings: Hyperintensity in the cortex along the left frontoparietal region with leptomeningeal enhancement most prominent in basal cistern, pons, and cerebellum.
Diffuse leptomeningeal enhancement, most pronounced in left frontal region, focus of restricted diffusion in left precentral gyrus consistent with ischemia.
A 3.6-cm mass in the left inferior frontal lobe with irregular margins and central necrosis, peripheral enhancement of the mass.
Extensive leptomeningeal enhancement along the entire spinal cord and cauda equina.
